revised_title: The Identification of Muriatic Acid in Animal Stomachs
topics: Acid and Saline Matters in Stomachs
tldr: The author investigates the nature of acid and saline matters in animal stomachs and concludes that the acid present is muriatic acid, while the salts are alkaline muriates. The findings have implications for understanding the physiology and pathology of the digestive process and other animal functions.
